title: Lake Shore Limited Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Lake Shore Limited
top_text:
Trains 48 and 448 are the same train from Chicago to Albany; cars separate to go to New York City and Boston.
Trains 49 and 449 join at Albany to become the same train from Albany to Chicago.
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided at Chicago by Metra,
at Poughkeepsie, Croton-Harmon, and New York by the MTA,
and at Worcester, Framingham and Boston by the MBTA.
